summary: In this context, buta-1,3-diene (BD) is discussed in relation to its metabolic processes, particularly focusing on the role of conjugation in detoxifying BD through pathways involving glutathione-S-transferase (GST). The mention of conjugation highlights its significance in the metabolic fate of BD, which is crucial for assessing human health risks associated with BD exposure, especially regarding reproductive toxicity and carcinogenicity.
